chat.content:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall (a1 a2 a3 : A) (l : list bool), inpb (pbleaf a1) (pbadd a2 (pbleaf a3) l) -> a1 = a2

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive inpb : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop := inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t | inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1) | inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1) | inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2) | inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pbadd = fix pbadd (a : A) (t : pbtree) (l : list bool) {struct l} : pbtree := match l with | nil => pbleaf a | true :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbright (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbright t2 => pbright (pbadd a t2 l1) | pbnode t1 t2 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a t2 l1) end | false :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbleft (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbleft (pbadd a t1 l1) | pbright t2 => pbnode (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) t2 | pbnode t1 t2 => pb
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
in_pbleaf_node : forall (a1 a2 : pbtree) (a3 a4 : A) (l : list bool), ~ inpb (pbnode a1 a2) (pbadd a3 (pbleaf a4) l)
pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (l1 : list bool), compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 (pbleaf a2) l1) = (a1, l1) :: nil
add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
pbfree_pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 : A) (l l1 : list bool), ~ is_prefix l l1 -> ~ is_prefix l1 l -> pbfree l (pbadd a1 (pbleaf empty) l1)
distinct_pbleaves_pbadd_prop1 : forall (a a1 : A) (l1 : list bool), distinct_pbleaves (pbadd a1 (pbleaf a) l1)
in_pbcompute_inpb : forall (t : pbtree) (a : A) (l : list bool), In (a, l) (compute_pbcode t) -> inpb (pbleaf a) t
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
add_frequency_list_unique_key : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), unique_key l -> unique_key (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
frequency_list_unique : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A), unique_key (frequency_list eqA_dec l)
not_in_find_code : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code eqA_dec a l = nil
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
pbadd_prop2 : forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (l2 : pbtree), pbfree l1 l2 -> permutation (compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 l2 l1)) ((a1, l1) :: compute_pbcode l2)
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
add_frequency_list_1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), (forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) l) -> In (a, 1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
inpb_compute_ex : forall (a : A) (p : pbtree), inpb (pbleaf a) p -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) (compute_pbcode p)
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
code_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (c : code A) (a : A), {exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c} + {forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) c}
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
restrict_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> code A
in_find_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (p : list (A * list bool)) (a : A) (l : list bool) (b : bool), In (a, l) p -> find_code eqA_dec a (map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, b :: b1)) p) = b :: find_code eqA_dec a p
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
in_alphabet_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (m : list A) (c : code A), {in_alphabet m c} + {~ in_alphabet m c}
encode_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (m1 : list A), ~ In a m1 -> encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) m1 = encode eqA_dec l m1
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
